page.title: 18ROSSENDALE GROUNDWORK TRUST
page.content: Rossendale Groundwork Trust Ltd. was officially launched on 7th October 1983.Its aims are to preserve the natural and traditional Rossendale environment and the organisation has four full time and six part time staff, with several hundred Groundwork members. It is supported by subscriptions and donations from members and friends and receives a grant from the council. Groundworkers tackle the problems of fly tipping, river pollution and blocked footpaths. Landscaping projects are undertaken in conjunction with the council and the Groundwork staff also organise tree planting, community clean ups and talks for any schools, groups or societies concerned about the Valleys appearance.
